capability.name: Collateral Asset Administration
capability.definition: This service domain maintains the status of a customers collateral assets, including scheduled and ad-hoc valuations and confirmation of the correct completion of scheduled maintenance tasks.
capability.role: This service domain handles the oversight, administration and confirmation of maintenance tasks associated with different types of collateral items. This includes arranging for scheduled and ad-hoc collateral valuations, item status/documentation and title checks and tracking upkeep actions that the item owner is obliged to undertake (such as insuring a house)
capability.example: A back office unit determines which collateral items are due for a valuation review and documentation check and schedules the activities accordingly

key_features.name: Record and classify collateral assets
key_features.description: Enables record and classify collateral assets to support this service domain maintains the status of a customers collateral assets, including scheduled and ad-hoc valuations and confirmation of the correct completion of scheduled maintenance tasks

key_features.name: Obtain collateral asset valuations
key_features.description: Enables obtain collateral asset valuations to support this service domain maintains the status of a customers collateral assets, including scheduled and ad-hoc valuations and confirmation of the correct completion of scheduled maintenance tasks

key_features.name: Confirm the maintenance and status of collateral assets
key_features.description: Enables confirm the maintenance and status of collateral assets to support this service domain maintains the status of a customers collateral assets, including scheduled and ad-hoc valuations and confirmation of the correct completion of scheduled maintenance tasks
